title: Starboy (album)
summary: Starboy is the third studio album by Canadian singer the Weeknd. It was released on November 25, 2016, through XO and Republic Records. The album features guest appearances from Daft Punk, Lana Del Rey, Kendrick Lamar, and Future. It was supported by seven singles: "Starboy", "I Feel It Coming", "Party Monster", "Reminder", "Rockin'", "Die for You", and "Secrets".
